66817.name: 17.18.3 - Number of countries with national statistical plans with funding from donors - SG_STT_NSDSFDDNR
66817.datasetName: Number of countries with a national statistical plan that is fully funded and under implementation, by source of funding
66817.s_name: Number of countries with a national statistical plan that is fully funded and under implementation, by source of funding

source.name: Number of countries with a national statistical plan that is fully funded and under implementation, by source of funding
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
The indicator Number of countries with a national statistical plan that is fully funded and under 
implementation is based on the annual Status Report on National Strategies for the Development of 
Statistics (NSDS). In collaboration with its partners, PARIS21 reports on country progress in designing and 
implementing national statistical plans. The indicator is a count of countries that are either (i) 
implementing a strategy, (ii) designing one or (iii) awaiting adoption of the strategy in the current year. 
 

Data Availability 

 
Description: 
 
The current time series for 2007-2015 covers 121 developing countries. 
 
Time series: 
 
From 2007 to 2015
